rub off.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to remove something from a surface by rubbing it, or to come off a surface because of being rubbed
rub off.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Some of the gold paint had begun to rub off.
Jack rubbed the mud off his face.
She rubbed off her lipstick and eye shadow.
rub off.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if a feeling, quality, or habit rubs off on you, you start to have it because you are with another person who has it
rub off.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: She refused to give up, and her confidence rubbed off on the others.
